Title: Piccole labbra
Writer: Mimmo Cattarinich (idea), Daniele Sánchez (story and screenplay), Mimmo Cattarinich (screenplay collaboration)
Actors: Pierre Clémenti, Katya Berger, Ugo Bologna, Michele Soavi
Plot: A writer returns home from World War I. He has developed a very bad case of post traumatic stress disorder. He contemplates suicide, but becomes interested in the 12 year old niece of the ...
